article.title: Comtech Mobile to Support FBCB2 Systems
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Comtech Mobile Datacom Corporation, Germantown, Maryland, was awarded a $25,425,000 firm-fixed-price contract for services supporting the Force XXI Battle Command Brigade and Below (FBCB2) systems. The company was also awarded a $21,125,000 firm-fixed-price contract for the operation, fielding, and repair services in support of the L-band communication aspects of the FBCB2 systems. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Fort Monmouth, New Jersey, is the contracting activity on both awards.
